backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing recent frontend feature changes and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of major frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_FIX_NOTE.md: Notes a deployment failure caused by env variable mismatch in Vite and describes root cause.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify/Vercel-style rule routing all paths to index.html for SPA behavior.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown routes to index.html.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack router and page routes wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Portfol: UI card providing copyable direct site and gallery URLs.
frontend/src/components/branding/QRCodeB: Renders QR code SVG from matrix data inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Simple section header with title and optional subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the site header with logo, navigation links, and social icons, including mobile drawer behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content area using a flex column layout.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaLight: Displays a fullscreen lightbox for images or videos with a close button and item details.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaStrip: Shows a responsive grid of media items with loading states, error handling, and category-based styling.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders a styled service section with description, features list, and a MediaStrip for related media.
frontend/src/content/branding.ts: Defines logo asset paths and company name branding constants.
frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts: Provides the gallery item interface and a list of categorized image and video media entries.
frontend/src/content/qrMatrix.ts: Exports a numeric matrix representing a QR code for the contact page.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Contains service definitions with descriptions, features, and additional offerings metadata.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Stores company copy including vision, mission, contact info, and slogan variations.
frontend/src/content/socialLinks.ts: Exports URLs for the company’s social media profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query backend hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom color variables, including light and dark themes with gold accents.
frontend/src/lib/publicAsset.ts: Resolves asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL to ensure correct paths across deployments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with company info, services, and brand tagline options.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details including email, location, and multiple phone numbers.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a filterable media gallery with category tabs, lightbox support, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, navigation buttons, contact info, and a services preview section.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the list of services and displays additional offerings with optional media strips.
frontend/src/pages/VisionMissionPage.tsx: Shows the company’s vision and mission using two styled card components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related tooling with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variables, path aliases, dev proxy, and build settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and state version info.
